Uses of Class
com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFMsg

  • Packages that use NDEFMsg 
    Package Description
    com.st.st25sdk
    The ST25SDK provides a rich and well tested Software Development Kit for the ST25 tags and Dynamics tags.
    com.st.st25sdk.command
    Defines methods to build the commands for: Iso7816, Iso14443, Iso15693, NFC Forum type 4, NFC Forum type 5, Vicinity including high level commands for NDEF messages
    com.st.st25sdk.iso14443a
    Defines all Tags classes to handle iso14443A tags
    com.st.st25sdk.iso14443b
    Defines all Tags classes to handle ISO14443B Tags
    com.st.st25sdk.iso14443sr
    Defines all Tags classes to handle SRi, SRiX, SRT, ST25TB series
    com.st.st25sdk.iso18092  
    com.st.st25sdk.ndef
    This package provides necessary classes to build NDEF messages.
    com.st.st25sdk.picopass  
    com.st.st25sdk.type1
    Defines all Tags classes to handle Type1 Tags
    com.st.st25sdk.type2  
    com.st.st25sdk.type3  
    com.st.st25sdk.type4a
    Provides classes to handle NFC Forum type4 Family Tags and Dynamic Tags.
    com.st.st25sdk.type4a.m24srtahighdensity
    Defines all Tags classes to handle M24SR series The M24SR series are an NFC Forum Type 4 Tags; Tags communicate using the ISO/IEC 14443 Type A protocol.
    com.st.st25sdk.type5
    Provides classes to handle NFC Forum Type5 Family Tags and Dynamic Tags.

      This function read a NDEF message from the NDEF file.
